issue.title: Javascript error in relation and replication search
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

In the relation and replication search form, there is a javascript error due to the call of the file :
http://cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/9dcbecd42ad/i18n/Fran%C3%A7ais%20(fr).json

The good file to load is : 
http://cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/9dcbecd42ad/i18n/French.json



**Fixed versions :** 4.2.7
